# cryptoapi

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of cryptoapi is to be a wrapper that imports and analyzes data from Binance, Binance US, Bitstamp, Coinbase, Coinbase Pro, Crypto.com, FTX, FTX US, Gemini, Huobi, Kraken, and Kucoin. 

Use at your own risk.

## Installation

You can install the development version of cryptoapi from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("cstjohn810/cryptoapi")
```

## Example

This is a basic example:

```{r example}
library(cryptoapi)
library(magrittr)
public_ticker_price()
```

```{r}
public_asset_list(exchange = "binance")
```

```{r}
public_order_book()
```
